pages.text: Wishing Wells and Fountains are rare structures that can spawn virtually anywhere in the overworld. They will appear encircled with flowers or cacti in the desert (v3.10.0+) and have an item frame with a gold coin (v3.10.0+). Simply toss any coin or gem into the water to receive loot. The loot spawned depends on the rarity of the coin/gem.

pages.title: Four-Leaf Clover
pages.text: Sometimes a clover is spawn around a Wishing Well.

Clovers can be harvested, but cannot be re-planted. You can use a clover item on a structure made from Cobblestone, Mossy Cobblestone, Stone Bricks or Mossy Stone Bricks to create a custom Wishing Well. A clover will only affect the blocks within a 4 block radius, and they must be adjacent to each other (NESWUD).

pages.title: Locked Chests
pages.text: If you are unable to find keys for a locked chest, you can toss the whole chest into a Wishing Well. This will remove ALL locks on the chest, however, there is a cost to do so. You have been warned!
